scripts.test:wip: BASE_URL='http://automationpractice.com' gherkin-testcafe firefox steps/*.ts features/*.feature --tags @wip -s takeOnFails=true
scripts.test:chrome:mobile: gherkin-testcafe chrome:emulation:device=iphone X --hostname 127.0.0.1 steps/*.ts features/*.feature --tags @mobile -s takeOnFails=true
scripts.tests-chrome-with-report: gherkin-testcafe chrome steps/*.ts features/*.feature -s --tags ~@wip takeOnFails=true --reporter cucumber-json:reports/report.json --reporter-app-name='testcafe-e2e-automation-framework' --reporter-app-version='1.0'
